title: Murder at Manassas
description: In July 1861, Harrison Grenville Raines, a Virginiaborn gamler, investor, and horse trader, becomes caught up in a murder mystery, when he is forced to investigate the coldblooded killing of a Union major during the Northern forces retreat from the Confederates at the Battle of Manassas, in the first of a new series of Civil War mysteries.
author: Michael Kilian
